fields.label: Homepage Identification
fields.name: homepage_identification
fields.instructions: Select the post you wish to use for the homepage. This is important, as all the configuration options for the homepage will be pulled directly from this post.

fields.label: Sponsor Highlight
fields.name: sponsor_highlight
fields.instructions: Do you want to display a sponsor in the mobile off-canvas navigation?

fields.label: Sponsor Highlighted
fields.name: sponsor_highlighted
fields.instructions: Do you want to display the platinum sponsor, or any random sponsor?

fields.label: Random Sponsor Title
fields.name: random_sponsor_title
fields.instructions: Customize the title for the random sponsor. If no title is set, "Proud Sponsor" will be displayed by default.

fields.label: Twitter
fields.name: twitter
fields.instructions: Add you Twitter username. Use only the username, do not include the @ symbol.

fields.label: Facebook
fields.name: facebook
fields.instructions: Add the URL to your Facebook page

fields.label: Google Plus
fields.name: google_plus
fields.instructions: Add the URL to your Google Plus page

fields.label: Instagram
fields.name: instagram
fields.instructions: Add the URL to your Instagram page

fields.label: Left Button Text
fields.name: left_button_text
fields.instructions: Add some text for the left button

fields.label: Left Button Link
fields.name: left_button_link
fields.instructions: Add a URL for the left button

fields.label: Middle Button Text
fields.name: middle_button_text
fields.instructions: Add some text for the middle button

fields.label: Middle Button Link
fields.name: middle_button_link
fields.instructions: Add a URL for the middle button

fields.label: Right Button Text
fields.name: right_button_text
fields.instructions: Add some text for the right button

fields.label: Right Button Link
fields.name: right_button_link
fields.instructions: Add a URL for the right button

fields.label: Sponsor Backup Text
fields.name: sponsor_backup_text
fields.instructions: This text would be used to promote becoming a sponsor when no silver or bronze sponsors are registered.

fields.label: Sponsor Intro
fields.name: sponsor_intro
fields.instructions: Do you want to display some introductory text on the sponsors listing page?

fields.label: Sponsor Intro Text
fields.name: sponsor_intro_text
fields.instructions: Add some text for the sponsor listing introduction / call to action

fields.label: Sponsor Intro Button Text
fields.name: sponsor_intro_button_text
fields.instructions: Add some text for the sponsor listing introduction / call to action button

fields.label: Sponsor Intro Button Link
fields.name: sponsor_intro_button_link
fields.instructions: Select a page to link the call to action button too

fields.label: Speakers Title
fields.name: speakers_title
fields.instructions: Customize the title for the speakers pages. If no title is specified, "Our Speakers" will be used by default.

fields.label: Sessions Title
fields.name: sessions_title
fields.instructions: Customize the title for the sessions pages. If no title is specified, "Our Presentations" will be used by default.

fields.label: Blog Title
fields.name: blog_title
fields.instructions: Customize the title for the blog pages. If no title is specified, "From the Blog" will be used by default.

fields.label: Sponsors Title
fields.name: sponsors_title
fields.instructions: Customize the title for the sponsor pages. If no title is specified, "Our Sponsors" will be used by default.

fields.label: Title Year
fields.name: title_year
fields.instructions: What year would you like to display in the various site titles? This is not required and can be left blank to allow for titles to display as #PSEWEB at any point during the year.

fields.label: Speaker Year
fields.name: speaker_year
fields.instructions: Select the speaker year you would like to actively display across the site

fields.label: Session Year
fields.name: session_year
fields.instructions: Select the session year you would like to actively display across the site

fields.label: Sponsor Year
fields.name: sponsor_year
fields.instructions: Select the sponsor year you would like to actively display across the site

fields.label: Global Sidebar
fields.name: global_sidebar
fields.instructions: Configure the global sidebar. Unless otherwise specified, this sidebar will be the default used site wide.

fields.label: Sponsor Logo
fields.name: sponsor_logo
fields.instructions: Add an image for the sponsor. It is recommended that the image be a PNG with a transparent background. To ensure high quality logos, ptimal size is 600px wide, but site will scale image to site the given space for each level of sponsorship.

fields.label: Banner Text
fields.name: banner_text

fields.label: Banner Link
fields.name: banner_link
fields.instructions: Add a link for the banner text. Optional

fields.label: Banner Image Type
fields.name: banner_image_type
fields.instructions: Would you like to use a preset, or custom banner image?

fields.name: banner_preset

fields.label: Banner Custom
fields.name: banner_custom
fields.instructions: Upload a custom image. Size should be 1200px by 500px

choices.mobile: Mobile (marketing, apps, user trends, web optimization, devices)
choices.cms: CMS (a specific CMS, a comparison, or a selection process)
